content: This article **is an orphan, as no other articles link to it**. Please introduce links to this page from related articles. *(December 2025)* This is a list of commercial sites in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). ## Street-side areas - [Boat Quay](/wiki/Boat_Quay) - [Bugis Village](/wiki/Bugis_Village) - [Clarke Quay](/wiki/Clarke_Quay) - [Jalan Kayu](/wiki/Jalan_Kayu) - [Peranakan Place](/wiki/Peranakan_Place) ## Shopping malls Full article: [List of shopping malls in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_shopping_malls_in_Singapore) ## Housing estate commercial areas ### [Ang Mo Kio](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio) - Ang Mo Kio Town Centre - Cheng San Centre - Chong Boon Centre - Kebun Baru Mall - Teck Ghee Square ### [Bedok](/wiki/Bedok) - [Bedok Mall](/wiki/Bedok_Mall) - Bedok Town Centre ### [Bishan](/wiki/Bishan,_Singapore) - Bishan Neighbourhood 1 Centre - Bishan North Shopping Mall - Bishan Town Centre ### [Bukit Batok](/wiki/Bukit_Batok) - Bukit Batok Town Centre - Bukit Batok West Shopping Centre - Gombak Place - [West Mall](/wiki/West_Mall) ### [Bukit Merah](/wiki/Bukit_Merah) - Bukit Merah Town Centre - Telok Blangah Neighbourhood Centre - [Tiong Bahru Plaza](/wiki/Tiong_Bahru_Plaza) ### [Bukit Panjang](/wiki/Bukit_Panjang) - Bukit Panjang Town Centre - Fajar Neighbourhood Shopping Centre - Greenridge Shopping Centre ### [Choa Chu Kang](/wiki/Choa_Chu_Kang) - Choa Chu Kang Town Centre - Keat Hong Shopping Centre - Limbang Shopping Centre - Sunshine Place - Teck Whye Shopping Centre - Yew Tee Square ### [Clementi](/wiki/Clementi,_Singapore) - Clementi Town Centre ### [Geylang](/wiki/Geylang) - Geylang East Central - Geylang Serai Centre - Joo Chiat Complex ### [Hougang](/wiki/Hougang) - Central Place - Hougang Town Centre - Hougang Green Shopping Mall - Kovan City ### [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang) - Bendemeer Shopping Mall ### [Jurong East](/wiki/Jurong_East) - [IMM (Singapore)](/wiki/IMM_(Singapore)) - Jurong East Neighbourhood 4 Centre - [Jurong Entertainment Centre](/wiki/Jurong_Entertainment_Centre) - Jurong East Regional Centre - Yuhua Place - Yuhua Village ### [Jurong West](/wiki/Jurong_West) - Boon Lay Shopping Centre - [Gek Poh Shopping Centre](/wiki/Gek_Poh_Shopping_Centre) - Jurong West Town Centre - Taman Jurong Neighbourhood Shopping Centre - [Jurong Point](/wiki/Jurong_Point) - [Pioneer Mall](/wiki/Pioneer_Mall) ### [Novena](/wiki/Novena,_Singapore) - Balestier Hill Shopping Centre ### [Pasir Ris](/wiki/Pasir_Ris) - Elias Mall - Loyang Point - Pasir Ris Town Centre - Pasir Ris West Plaza - Pasir Ris Neighbourhood 4 Centre - [White Sands Shopping Centre](/wiki/White_Sands_Shopping_Centre) ### [Punggol](/wiki/Punggol) - Punggol Town Centre - [Punggol Plaza](/wiki/Punggol_Plaza) - Fernvale Point ### [Queenstown](/wiki/Queenstown,_Singapore) - [Holland Village](/wiki/Holland_Village,_Singapore) - Mei Ling Heights - Queenstown Town Centre - Tanglin Halt Centre ### [Sembawang](/wiki/Sembawang) - Sembawang Town Centre ### [Sengkang](/wiki/Sengkang) - [Rivervale Plaza](/wiki/Rivervale,_Singapore) - Rivervale Mall - [Sengkang Town Centre](/wiki/Sengkang_Town_Centre) ### [Serangoon](/wiki/Serangoon) - Serangoon North Neighbourhood Centre - Serangoon Town Centre ### [Simei](/wiki/Simei) - [EastPoint Mall](/wiki/EastPoint_Mall) ### [Tampines](/wiki/Tampines) - Tampines Mart - Tampines Regional Centre - [Century Square](/wiki/Century_Square) - [Tampines Mall](/wiki/Tampines_Mall) ### [Toa Payoh](/wiki/Toa_Payoh) - [600 @ Toa Payoh](/wiki/600_@_Toa_Payoh) - [ERA APAC Centre](/wiki/ERA_APAC_Centre) - Toa Payoh Town Centre ### [Woodlands](/wiki/Woodlands,_Singapore) - 888 Plaza - Admiralty Place - Vista Point - Woodlands Mart - Woodlands North Plaza - Woodlands Regional Centre - [Causeway Point](/wiki/Causeway_Point) ### [Yishun](/wiki/Yishun) - Chong Pang City - Nee Soon East Courtyard ### Other estates - Albert Centre - [Bras Basah Complex](/wiki/Bras_Basah_Complex) - [Changi Village](/wiki/Changi_Village) - Cheng Yan Court - Chinatown Complex - Crawford Centre - Hong Lim Complex - Kitchener Complex - [Potong Pasir](/wiki/Potong_Pasir) - [Rochor Centre](/wiki/Rochor_Centre) - Tanjong Pagar Plaza - Upper Aljunied - Waterloo Centre - [Zhujiao Centre](/wiki/Zhujiao_Centre)
title: List of commercial sites in Singapore
